sections.quote: Applying the Fitzgerald Principle to AI: holding the opposing ideas of human irreplaceability AND AI capabilities simultaneously.

sections.title: Why Human-AI Collaboration
sections.description: Understanding the AI S-Curve: We're at the inflection point where AI transitions from novelty to necessity. The question isn't whether to collaborate with AI, but how to do it in ways that amplify rather than diminish human agency.

sections.title: Context Engineering
sections.description: The real skill isn't prompting‚Äîit's architecting what AI knows before it reasons. Three pillars: System Prompts (persistent memory), Tools & MCP (extended capabilities), and Conversation Architecture (information flow).

sections.title: The Fitzgerald Principle
sections.description: Most people use AI to do more. I'm exploring how to do less‚Äîsystematically. AI as complementarity, not replacement. Time compounds faster than money.

sections.title: Three-Hat Framework
sections.description: Rapid context switching validated across 3+ client projects

items.title: Product Manager
items.description: User needs, feature prioritization, business value

sections.title: Claude Mastery Program
sections.description: 8 comprehensive modules covering everything from prompt engineering to computer use capabilities. Includes 2025 breakthroughs: Claude Opus 4.5, Claude Code, Extended Thinking, and Prompt Caching.

sections.title: Portfolio Highlights
sections.description: Real implementations proving human-AI collaboration creates value greater than the sum of parts

experiments.title: ADHD-AI Optimization
experiments.description: Hypothesis: ADHD cognitive patterns provide natural advantages for AI collaboration speed and context switching.

experiments.title: 2-Minute Rule for AI
experiments.description: If users can't achieve first success within 2 minutes, the AI architecture has failed.

sections.title: Living Laboratory
sections.description: Every framework is tested in real implementations. Proof over promises, experiments over theories. Exploring the convergence of AI, Sustainability, and Robotics.
